snippet: Novak Djokovic was dumped out of the Paris Masters in straight sets by Marin Cilic on Friday, opening the door for Andy Murray to end the Serb's two-year stranglehold on the world number one ranking....
lead_paragraph: Novak Djokovic was dumped out of the Paris Masters in straight sets by Marin Cilic on Friday, opening the door for Andy Murray to end the Serb's two-year stranglehold on the world number one ranking.

headline.print_headline: Djokovic Defeat Sets Up Murray to Go to No. 1
headline.main: Djokovic Defeat Sets Up Murray to Go to No. 1
